CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 4, 1960, pg. A12 reads: "For Bride-To-Be - The Vigs, a group of young lovelies, gave a per-wedding shower recently for charming Barbara Griggs, seated fifth from left. Others, seated left to right, are Ethel Robinson, Marlene Jones, Alberta Thompson, Juanita Orbison, Barbara, Sylvia Washington and Arlene Waller.  Standing: Effie Brown, Shirley Evans, Delores Southers, Betty Stokes and Greta Moriarity. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Vigs members, from left, seated: Ethel Robinson, Marlene Jones, Alberta Thompson, Juanita Orbison, Barbara Griggs, guest of honor; Sylvia Washington, and Arlene Waller; Standing: Effie Brown, Shirley Evans, Delores Southers, Betty Stokes and Greta Moriarity, gathered around table with gifts in interior for bridal shower
